means: 苏格兰的植物学家Robert Brown 的

sentence.Network_en: The path of a particle in Brownian motion is erratic and frequently changes direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个布朗运动粒子的路径是不规则的,并且常常改变方向.

sentence.Network_en: Tell me, does the shooter's path look brownian to you ?
sentence.Network_cn: 告诉我, 你看枪手路线像是布朗运动 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: The property of fractional Brownian motion ( FBM ) is studied in a time and time - scaledomain.
sentence.Network_cn: 从时域和时间尺度域研究了分数布朗运动的特性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pricing european currency options in a fractional brownian environment ., 分数布朗运动下欧式汇率期权的定价.
brownian ratchet with a position - dependent two - state random perturbation ., 具有随机两态势的布朗粒子摇摆棘齿模型.
study on the current and the efficiency of the coupled brownian motor两耦合布朗粒子的流和整流效率研究

list.abs: measure transformation and option pricing in fractional brownian motion environment ., 分数布朗运动环境下的期权定价与测度变换.
brown uranium oxide 二氧化铀brownian fluctuations 布朗波动brownian motion 布朗运动
Hurst exponent plays an important role in brownian motion ., hurst 指数是描述分数布朗运动的重要指标.
impact of brownian diffusion on granular bed filtration ., 布朗扩散对颗粒床过滤的影响.

auth_sentence.content: In essense, brownian motion is really a wave diffraction effect to begin with, and hence pressure and temperature are too.
auth_sentence.res_content: In essense, brownian motion is really a wave diffraction effect to begin with, and hence pressure and temperature are too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In essense, brownian motion is really a wave diffraction effect to begin with, and hence pressure and temperature are too.
